msbt.message: Why, hello there. You're here to visit our island, I see.Goodness! I said "our island," but really, I just moved here myself! It must mean I'm settling in nicely. Well, I'm . It's a pleasure to meet you.I'll be busy unpacking all day today, but come say hello anytime you're on the island, .

Why, hello. I don't believe we've been introduced. You're visiting from , correct? Well, I'm . I moved to the island just today, as it happens.I'm sorry I can't offer to make you tea, but we'll have a nice long chat next time, !

Oh dear, I'm sorry. My new home is in quite the state of disarray right now! And you are?Oh, visiting from , eh? So you're not one of my new neighbors, then. Well, I'm , and I just landed on the island today.I'm terribly busy settling in, but I do hope we can get to know each other better soon.

Why, I don't believe we've met before. Here to visit, my dear? Well, welcome! I'm . And you are<10_4 />? A pleasure to make your acquaintance. It's a darling little island. Lovely as a daisy in a field of grass. Well, I do hope you enjoy your stay.

I don't think I've seen you around here before Here to visit from , are you?Oh, but where are my manners? I'm . Pleased to meet you! And you are? Well, , you have a new friend on this island. Do stop by and say hello when you're here.

Oh, hello! I don't think we've met. Let me guessyou're visiting from another island, perhaps? Welcome! I'm . And you are<10_4 /> ? I see! Charmed, I'm sure. It may sound silly, but I have this feeling fate brought us together today. Only time will tell, I suppose. Anyhoo, whenever you're here on , do stop by and say hello.
